translation.en: Harper, just please get your shoes on. Please.
translation.it: Harper, mettiti le scarpe. Per favore.

translation.en: I don't want to.
Come on.
Hey, do you know what we're doing today?
We're going on an adventure together.
We're going to get on a boat. We're gonna sail across the sea to a place
translation.it: Saliremo su una nave e attraverseremo il mare

translation.en: where it's always sunny and you can eat ice cream every day.
translation.it: per un posto in cui c'è sempre il sole e tu puoi mangiare il gelato ogni giorno.

translation.en: Would you like that?
Good. The only thing is,
we need to leave now. Okay?
Do you know why?
[whispers] Because there's a dragon out there.
translation.it: Perché là fuori c'è un drago.

translation.en: And if we make any noise, or if we're too slow, the dragon will eat us. Okay?
translation.it: E se facciamo rumore o se siamo troppo lente, il drago ci mangia. Ok?

translation.en: So are you going to put your shoes on for me?
[woman] You okay?
Okay, Harper. I think you just have to walk. Is that all right?
translation.it: Ok, Harper. Ok, ora devi camminare, va bene?

translation.en: [man] All right, there you go.
Yeah, over there.
Here's the money.
Which boat?
-[man] It's the blue fishing trawler. -[woman] Right.
translation.it: - È il peschereccio blu laggiù. - Va bene.

translation.en: [man] Right, young lady. In you go.
There you go.
Harper's been practicing this song all week.
translation.it: È una settimana che Harper canta questa canzone.

translation.en: It's been driving me and Jordi mad.
translation.it: Ha fatto impazzire me e Jordi.

translation.en: Off you go.
There was a woman in Germany who got a song stuck in her head for four years.
translation.it: Una donna tedesca ha avuto una canzone in testa per quattro anni.

translation.en: She ended up being hospitalized.
That can't be real.
-Actually, I think maybe it was hiccups. -It's an urban myth.
translation.it: Forse era singhiozzo. È una leggenda.

translation.en: Well, you're the teacher. Supply teacher, so…
translation.it: - Beh, sei tu l'insegnante. - Supplente, quindi…

translation.en: Well, only until the big interview on Tuesday.
translation.it: Solo fino al colloquio di martedì.

translation.en: I just hope you remember us little people when you're swanning about the staff room.
translation.it: Spero ti ricorderai di noi quando sarai tra i privilegiati.

translation.en: Oh, of course I will, uh…
Olivia? School secretary?
translation.it: Sei Olivia? La segretaria della scuola?

translation.en: Very funny.
Thank you.
[Olivia] She's enjoying it, though.
Yeah. It's good. I think she's finally starting to fit in here.
translation.it: Sì. Sono contenta. Sta iniziando ad ambientarsi.

translation.en: I'm very happy we ended up in Barcelona.
translation.it: Sono felice di essere a Barcellona.

translation.en: Plus, she gets to be a planet.
translation.it: E poi lei può fare un pianeta.

translation.en: Well, she's… she's Pluto, isn't she?
Yeah, but it still counts.
Yeah.
-[grunts] -What did you say?
-Hey! Hey! -[boy] Stop!
-Hey! Enough! -[Harper] You're so annoying!
Hey! Hey! Break it up!
-You fucking fucker-- -Stop!
[girl] What are you doing?
[woman] Harper, enough.
So are you going to tell me?
translation.it: Allora, me lo dici o no?

translation.en: I mean, there's got to be a reason.
Getting kicked out of the musical.
It's just, you seemed pretty vocal before.
translation.it: Hai usato anche un certo linguaggio.

translation.en: F this, F that.
I've got to go to the toilet.
SUPERMARKET
[woman in Catalan] The supermarket will close in two minutes.
translation.it: Il supermercato chiuderà tra due minuti.

translation.en: Don't miss our special three for two offer in frozen foods.
So, you know, we're closing soon to do inventory.
translation.it: Tra poco dobbiamo chiudere per inventario.

translation.en: [in English] Oh, sorry my Catalan is very bad. Sorry.
translation.it: Scusa, il mio catalano è pessimo. Perdonami.

translation.en: We close in five minutes. Okay, thank you.
translation.it: - Chiudiamo tra cinque minuti. - Ok, grazie.

translation.en: Harper, say thank you.
Harp!
FYI, when you throw a punch, you need to keep your fist tight.
translation.it: Comunque, se sferri un pugno, devi tenerlo stretto.

translation.en: It's basic physics.
Dissipates the force of impact. Otherwise, you'll damage your knuckles and wrists.
translation.it: Dissipa la forza dell'impatto, altrimenti ti fai male.

translation.en: Of course, all of this is irrelevant
'cause you're never going to hit anyone again, are you?
translation.it: perché non colpirai mai più nessuno, vero?

translation.en: He asked where my white stick was. Said I needed to stay at the back of the stage 'cause…
translation.it: Mi ha chiesto dove avevo lasciato il bastone e perché ero sul palco…

translation.en: Antonio is a little S-H-I-T.
A shit.
You're not meant to say the word. That's the point of spelling it out.
translation.it: Non dovresti dire la parola. Dilla lettera per lettera.

translation.en: You will apologize, okay?
We don't solve our problems with violence.
translation.it: La violenza non risolve i problemi.

translation.en: Are you going to tell Jordi?
[sighs] Don't know. We'll see.
You can call him Dad, you know.
Mmm, I know, I just like the name Jordi.
translation.it: Lo so, ma mi piace il nome Jordi.

translation.en: Yeah, but I still think he prefers for you to call him Dad.
translation.it: Sì, ma credo preferisca che tu lo chiami papà.

translation.en: [woman] I thought I told you, eyes on the ground! Shut the fuck up!
translation.it: Cosa vi ho detto? Guardate a terra! E state zitti!

translation.en: [whispers] Stay quiet. Stay quiet. Quick.
-Sh! Sh! -What?
[whispers] Down.
[man in Spanish] Move!
I said move!
I told you to keep moving.
-Keep moving! -No, please!
[in English] Are you okay?
[Harper] Mum!
It's you.
Ambulance! Someone, call an ambulance!
[in Spanish] Sorry.
-[Erin] Jordi! -Hey!
[Erin in English] We're okay.
[woman in Catalan] Nurse Garcia, please contact Urology.
-[in English] Are you okay? -[Erin] It's okay.
translation.it: - Stai bene? - Sì. - Hanno detto… - Non è il mio sangue.

translation.en: It's not my blood.
translation.it: - Hanno detto… - Non è il mio sangue.

translation.en: -It's okay. -Okay.
Okay, let's get you to a room. Yeah?
translation.it: Va bene, vi porto in una stanza. Ok?

translation.en: You're okay…
[doctor] Okay…
Bruised ribs, hip contusion, minor concussions.
translation.it: Costole incrinate, contusione all'anca e lieve commozione cerebrale.

translation.en: I'll prescribe some painkillers, okay? Okay.
[doctor] All things considered, it could have been worse.
You and Harper are good to go.
Thank you.
[woman in Catalan] We remind you smoking is not permitted in this hospital.
translation.it: In questo ospedale non è permesso fumare.

translation.en: Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas.
translation.it: Fumare è consentito nelle aree adibite.

translation.en: [in English] So? [Erin] I'm all right. Just a bit of bruising.
translation.it: - Allora? - Sto bene. Solo qualche livido.

translation.en: Hey.
Are you okay?
What happened was pretty scary. It's okay not to be okay.
translation.it: È stato spaventoso. È normale se non ti senti bene.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Hey, I spotted a machine down the hall.
translation.it: Ho visto una macchinetta qua in fondo.

translation.en: Why don't you get yourself a snack and a fizzy drink?
translation.it: Perché non ti prendi da bere e uno snack?

translation.en: You said I'm not allowed any snacks or fizzy drinks after six o'clock.
translation.it: Avevi detto che non posso mangiarli fino alle sei.

translation.en: -I think we can make an exception. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Credo che possiamo fare un'eccezione. - Sì.

translation.en: Here you go.
[woman in Catalan] Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas,
translation.it: Fumare è consentito nelle aree adibite.

translation.en: at the canteen exit, and at the Emergency entrances.
translation.it: All'uscita della mensa e agli ingressi di emergenza.

translation.en: [in English] As a nurse, they train you to act calm and professional.
translation.it: Gli infermieri devono essere calmi e professionali.

translation.en: It's actually quite reassuring.
Ah, good, 'cause inside I'm completely freaking out.
I'm so glad you're safe.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu stia bene.

translation.en: What happened to the guy?
Uh, he's out of surgery.
-Okay. -Yeah, he's in ICU.
He lost a lot of blood, though, so he might not make it through the night.
translation.it: Ha perso molto sangue, quindi potrebbe non superare la notte.

translation.en: Can I see him?
Erin, this is not your fault.
At all.
But let me see what I can do.
translation.it: Ma vedo se posso fare qualcosa.

translation.en: We can't stay long, okay?
Shit. I… I forgot to tell Harper where we were going.
translation.it: Merda. Non ho detto a Harper che venivamo qui.

translation.en: I'll be a minute.
Okay.
You.
It's you, Kate. It's really you.
translation.it: Sei tu, Kate. Sei davvero tu.

translation.en: I don't know you.
We've never met. Liar.
Liar! Liar.
[man in Spanish] Let's go!
[man in Catalan] Emergency. All available doctors report to room 124.
translation.it: Emergenza. Personale nella stanza 124. Tieni. Siediti qui.

translation.en: [in English] Sit here.
Wait here. Okay?
[woman in Spanish] He's in V-fib.
[in English] You have to go.
[woman in Spanish] Okay.
-[paddles whirring] -Clear. Clear.
[in English] It's okay, baby.
[Jordi] You sure you're okay?
Yeah.
Well…
It's like Harper said. It's 50/50.
translation.it: È come ha detto Harper. Sto così così.

translation.en: Well, you know, they have people at the hospital, uh, counselors.
translation.it: Beh, lo sai. Possono aiutarti in ospedale. Ci sono terapeuti specializzati in situazioni post-traumatiche.

translation.en: Specialists who deal with post-traumatic situations.
translation.it: Ci sono terapeuti specializzati in situazioni post-traumatiche.

translation.en: Yeah.
Oh. What are you doing?
I'm distracting you.
[Jordi] That's not… going to work.
It's going to work.
Okay. It is going to work. But I still think that we should talk
translation.it: Ok, hai ragione. Ma, comunque, dovremmo parlare di ciò che è successo.

translation.en: about what happened.
translation.it: Ma, comunque, dovremmo parlare di ciò che è successo.

translation.en: That's why I'm trying to distract you.
-[Harper] Hey there. -[Jordi] Mmm.
[Harper] Right.
See you in a bit.
-Bye. -[Harper] Bye.
[Jordi] There you go. Three, two, one.
-Okay! -Will you eat some more?
-[Harper] Okay. -[Jordi] It's looking good.
Pour some more in. Come on.
-[Harper] How about this? -[Jordi] That's perfect.
-[Harper] Can I flip it again? -[Jordi] Of course.
[Erin] Antonio, hi.
How are you feeling?
I'm sorry Harper hit you.
But what you said wasn't very nice.
translation.it: Ma hai detto una cosa poco carina.

translation.en: I was hoping I could speak to your parents.
translation.it: Posso parlare con i tuoi genitori?

translation.en: Dad's on a business trip. Mum's got a tennis lesson. She's round the back.
translation.it: Papà è in viaggio d'affari e mamma sta giocando a tennis sul retro.

translation.en: It's her birthday today.
I know. We're coming to her party tonight. It's going to be fun!
translation.it: Lo so. Stasera verremo alla sua festa. Ci divertiremo.

translation.en: -Have you got it fixed yet? -[Jordi] Yeah.
Watch this.
Huh? No. Okay, no, no. No, no.
That is… a work in progress.
Why don't you take the day off?
Oh, I can't. Not with this job review coming up. I need to show my face.
translation.it: Non posso. Ci stanno valutando, devo farmi vedere.

translation.en: Well, can you promise, at least, to not get involved in any armed robberies?
translation.it: Non farti coinvolgere in nessuna rapina, però.

translation.en: I want to say yes… Ears.
Harp, we're going to be late. Move it!
Morning, Emilio.
[in Spanish] Good morning.
[in English] Wow. Almost made it into your house.
translation.it: Caspita. Sei quasi entrato in casa tua.

translation.en: Almost. Yeah.
I was going to call around last night.
-I heard what happened at the supermarket. -Oh, we're fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.it: - Ho saputo della rapina. - Stiamo bene. Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: We'll need to interview you today or tomorrow.
I'll be on the investigating team, so don't worry about it.
translation.it: Mi occuperò io delle indagini, stai tranquilla.

translation.en: There's not much to say, but okay, sure.
translation.it: Non c'è molto da dire, ma va bene.

translation.en: -Hey, if you want coffee, Jordi made some. -Okay. Thank you.
translation.it: - Se vuoi un caffè, Jordi l'ha preparato. - Ok. Grazie.

translation.en: -See you. -[Emilio] Bye.
Glasses on, Harp.
Why does he sleep in his car?
You know how Emilio's wife doesn't live there anymore?
translation.it: Sai che sua moglie non vive più lì?

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, he misses her a lot, so he'd rather sleep in the car than an empty bed.
translation.it: Gli manca molto. Preferisce dormire in auto che da solo.

translation.en: That's sad.
It is, yeah.
[Emilio in Spanish] Hey, buddy, give me a coffee.
[Erin in English] You don't have to be here if you're not ready yet.
translation.it: Se non ti senti pronta, non devi andarci.

translation.en: -I can take you home. -[Harper] I'm fine.
translation.it: - Posso portarti a casa. - Sto bene.

translation.en: Oh, uh, see you later, Mum.
[Erin] Bye.
[man] You're a hero, Erin.
We are so glad you are okay.
translation.it: Siamo felici che tu stia bene.

translation.en: Is Harper okay? We were so worried. [Erin] She's fine. Thank you.
translation.it: - Harper sta bene? Eravamo preoccupati. - Sta bene. Grazie.

translation.en: So… there's bad news and good news.
translation.it: Allora, ci sono buone e cattive notizie.

translation.en: Okay.
So the bad news is Penelope Reyna's lodged a formal complaint
translation.it: La cattiva notizia è che Penelope Reyna ha richiesto l'espulsione di Harper.

translation.en: to have Harper removed from the school.
translation.it: che Penelope Reyna ha richiesto l'espulsione di Harper.

translation.en: You're fucking kidding me.
She's very upset about what happened to her son.
translation.it: È furiosa per ciò che è successo al figlio.

translation.en: She claims Harper is a psychopath.
translation.it: Dice che Harper è una psicopatica.

translation.en: Olivia, you do know Antonio was making fun of her eye problem.
translation.it: L'ha derisa per il problema agli occhi.

translation.en: Or was it a sociopath?
Psychopath? Sociopath? Anyway, people tell me there's a difference, but tomato, tomato.
translation.it: Psicopatica o sociopatica? So che è diverso, ma va beh.

translation.en: I mean, will she succeed or what do I do?
It's Penelope, so…
What's the good news?
The good news. The good news is, well, you got attacked in a supermarket.
translation.it: La buona notizia. La buona notizia è… Sei stata aggredita in un supermercato.

translation.en: How is that good news, Olivia?
Big picture. Before you were some faceless drone, a totally forgettable substitute teacher,
translation.it: Guarda il quadro generale. Prima eri una supplente qualunque,

translation.en: but now you are a hero who stopped a robbery
translation.it: ma ora sei l'eroina che ha fermato una rapina

translation.en: and definitely deserves that full-time contract.
translation.it: e merita un contratto a tempo indeterminato.

translation.en: Plus, you've got your photo in the paper.
translation.it: e merita un contratto a tempo indeterminato. Sei sul giornale.

translation.en: Don't worry. You look great. It's a lovely photo.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Stai benissimo. È una bella foto.

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Yeah, okay. I need to go.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Stai benissimo. È una bella foto. Ok. Devo andare.

translation.en: -Okay. -[Erin] Yeah.
Okay.
-Hello. -[students] Hello.
I'm Mrs. Carter. I'll be filling in for Mr. Luis today.
translation.it: Sono la sig.ra Carter. Oggi sostituisco il sig. Luis.

translation.en: Good aim, Dylan.
[Dylan] It was an accident, Miss. Don't shoot me.
translation.it: È stato un incidente, prof. Non mi spari.

translation.en: [Erin] Okay, so, uh, page 29.
-Hey. -Hello.
-What are you doing here? -[Emilio] I was worried.
translation.it: - Cosa ci fai qui? - Ero preoccupato.

translation.en: How are your classes going?
Okay.
Look, your interview is scheduled for two o'clock tomorrow.
Sant Àngel station. You're speaking to Inspector Tabarez.
translation.it: Centrale Sant Àngel. Parlerai con l'ispettore Tabarez.

translation.en: Yeah, okay. But did you need to come all the way here to tell me that?
translation.it: Ok, ma c'era bisogno che venissi qui a dirmelo?

translation.en: No, but I want to give you my take on the situation.
translation.it: No, ma volevo darti un consiglio.

translation.en: These people were professionals.
They knew Thursday was the payroll.
translation.it: Sapevano che il giovedì era giorno di paga. Sono arrivati di sera,

translation.en: They came at the end of the day, disabled security cameras except…
translation.it: Sapevano che il giovedì era giorno di paga. Sono arrivati di sera, hanno disattivato le telecamere,

translation.en: they missed one.
An older model on a different circuit.
translation.it: Un vecchio modello su un altro circuito.

translation.en: -Yeah… -You handled yourself pretty well.
translation.it: - Sì… - Te la sei cavata bene.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you hear about these things, don't you?
A woman's child is being trapped under a car, and she finds the strength to
translation.it: Il figlio di una donna è intrappolato sotto un'auto e lei trova la forza

translation.en: lift it up.
Or to stab someone in the legs twice with a cake tester
translation.it: O di pugnalare qualcuno nella gamba con un tester per dolci.

translation.en: and then shoot them? I didn't shoot anyone. The gun just went off.
translation.it: - E poi sparargli? - Non gli ho sparato. È partito un colpo.

translation.en: -Okay. -Look. Am I in trouble here?
No, no, of course not. I mean…
No, I know you.
But my boss is a bloodhound, and he'll be all over this footage,
translation.it: Ma il mio capo è un segugio, studierà a fondo questo filmato e forse

translation.en: and maybe to him, this will look a little different,
translation.it: Ma il mio capo è un segugio, studierà a fondo questo filmato e forse vedrà le cose in modo diverso.

translation.en: so if there's anything you need to tell me, now would be--
translation.it: Quindi se c'è qualcosa che devi dirmi, ora è…

translation.en: Only that you're being a bit of a dick right now, okay?
Okay.
[sighs] Just be careful. There were two of them at the supermarket.
translation.it: Ma stai attenta. Erano in due. Uno è morto, ma l'altro…

translation.en: One's dead but the other one… the other one is still out there.
translation.it: Erano in due. Uno è morto, ma l'altro… L'altro è a piede libero.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
Thanks, Emilio.
I feel great now.
-I'll see you at the party. -Yeah, okay. See you later.
translation.it: - Ci vediamo alla festa. - A dopo.

translation.en: But look after yourself.
I am.
Hey, Harp. Harp.
Go and find Antonio and say hello to him.
translation.it: Vai a cercare Antonio e salutalo.

translation.en: Do I have to?
Well, yeah.
Go. Go.
Yeah.
-Everybody's talking about you. -Yeah.
Penelope's going to love that, someone else being the center of attention.
translation.it: Penelope sarà contentissima che le rubi la scena.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe I should, I don't know, wish her a happy birthday.
translation.it: Sì, forse dovrei farle gli auguri, non so.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
-Yeah. -And we will go find the bar.
Yeah, that's an even better idea.
translation.it: Quest'idea mi piace ancora di più.

translation.en: You okay?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'm good.
Hey, Antonio.
My mum says I've got to apologize to you.
translation.it: Mamma dice che devo scusarmi con te.

translation.en: So shake my hand.
If you don't shake my hand, I'm going to stab your eyes out.
translation.it: O mi dai la mano o ti cavo gli occhi.

translation.en: Mmm, thank you, Antonio. You look very smart.
I'm gonna go get some ice cream now.
Hi.
Harper's very sorry about what happened and I'm sorry too.
translation.it: A me e Harper dispiace molto per ciò che è successo.

translation.en: Thank you, Erin. That means a lot.
[Erin] Yeah, she's been…
She's had a tough week. Okay, she's… It's been a lot.
translation.it: una settimana difficile. È stata dura.

translation.en: I know, and it breaks my heart.
translation.it: Lo so e mi si spezza il cuore.

translation.en: But the other children need to be protected from her.
translation.it: Ma gli altri bambini devono essere protetti da lei.

translation.en: Oh, fuck off, Penelope.
Seriously? She's… she's not a danger to anyone.
translation.it: Sul serio? Non è un pericolo per nessuno.

translation.en: She doesn't have to be kicked out of school. I can see where she gets her temper from.
translation.it: - Non dev'essere espulsa. - Ora so da chi ha preso.

translation.en: Okay, I apologize.
But I was hoping we could sort this ourselves, as neighbors.
translation.it: Speravo di risolverla tra noi, da brave vicine.

translation.en: We're not neighbors.
We just live near each other.
You think you're better than everyone else?
Me?
You have a giant, naked ice sculpture of yourself. Come on.
translation.it: Tu hai una statua di ghiaccio di te stessa!

translation.en: That was a gift of love from my husband.
translation.it: È un regalo di mio marito.

translation.en: I will try my best to be a better neighbor, if that's what you want, but please don't…
translation.it: Sarò una vicina migliore, se è ciò che vuoi, ma, ti prego, non…

translation.en: don't get Harper expelled. She needs this.
We'll see, Erin.
Now move along. You're spoiling the view.
translation.it: Ora spostati. Mi rovini la visuale.

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
[Jordi] Uh-huh. Yeah.
Yeah, come on.
We weren't arguing. I was just asking her the name of her ice sculptor.
translation.it: Non abbiamo discusso. Le ho chiesto il nome dello scultore.

translation.en: You never know when you're going to need one. It was quite impressive, I have to admit.
translation.it: - Magari vorrò una statua di ghiaccio. - Era notevole.

translation.en: Do you think she has a special guy for that?
Well, she didn't want to tell me.
What?
I turned the lights off before we left.
translation.it: Ho spento le luci prima di uscire.

translation.en: [Jordi] Harp, wait here.
Or maybe you just forgot?
Good afternoon, Mrs. Carter. I'm Inspector Tabarez. Let's get started.
translation.it: Buon pomeriggio, sig.ra Carter. Sono l'ispettore Tabarez. Iniziamo.

translation.en: In Strasbourg, you were a private tutor to an American family.
translation.it: A Strasburgo, ha lavorato come tutor in una famiglia americana.

translation.en: Yes, the Palmers. They had two children, Lisa and Mark.
translation.it: Sì, i Palmer. Avevano due figli, Lisa e Mark.

translation.en: And when you started as a substitute at St. Joseph's International,
translation.it: E quando ha iniziato come supplente alla Saint Joseph’s International,

translation.en: this Palmer family were provided as reference.
translation.it: ha fornito i dati della famiglia Palmer come referente.

translation.en: Yes, I think so. Yes.
[Tabarez] The phone number that you gave for them is no longer in use.
translation.it: Il loro numero di telefono non è più attivo.

translation.en: People change phones.
No, there is no trace of any such family in Strasbourg at that time.
translation.it: No. Non esisteva quella famiglia a Strasburgo in quel periodo.

translation.en: I… I don't know what to tell you. They were there and…
translation.it: Non so cosa dirle. C'erano e…

translation.en: [Tabarez] Your husband, Jordi Collantes, is a nurse at Hospital General?
translation.it: Suo marito, Jordi Collantes, è un infermiere all'Hospital General.

translation.en: He took you to the ICU to see the injured man from the supermarket?
translation.it: L'ha portata in terapia intensiva a vedere l'uomo del supermercato?

translation.en: [Erin] Yes, I felt bad about what happened.
You felt bad about the person who tried to kill you?
translation.it: Le dispiaceva per l'uomo che voleva ucciderla?

translation.en: I felt bad about what happened. Yes.
[Tabarez] And was your husband with you when this man suffered his heart attack?
translation.it: E suo marito era con lei quando l'uomo ha avuto un infarto?

translation.en: No, I asked him to go check on our daughter, Harper.
translation.it: No, era con nostra figlia, Harper.

translation.en: Oh, so you were alone with the deceased?
translation.it: Quindi è rimasta da sola con il defunto?

translation.en: [Erin] Well, Jordi was only gone for a minute
and there was a policeman outside the room the whole time.
translation.it: e c'era un poliziotto fuori dalla stanza.

translation.en: Did you know that asphyxiation can bring on a cardiac arrest?
translation.it: Sa che l'asfissia può causare un arresto cardiaco?

translation.en: No, I did not.
[Tabarez] So maybe this man died due to complications from his gunshot wound,
translation.it: Quindi forse quest'uomo è morto per una complicazione alla ferita

translation.en: or maybe someone took a pillow and with their hands…
translation.it: o forse qualcuno ha preso un cuscino e con le mani…

translation.en: Hold on. I've done nothing wrong.
translation.it: Aspetti, io non ho fatto niente!

translation.en: [Tabarez] That is not for you to decide.
Listen. I don't give a fuck what you think the CCTV footage shows you, okay?
translation.it: Senta, non me ne frega un cazzo di cos'ha visto nei filmati di sicurezza.

translation.en: Does it show my daughter, terrified?
Hiding from the man with the fucking gun?
translation.it: Mentre si nasconde dall'uomo armato, cazzo?

translation.en: [Tabarez] No.
There is no footage from the supermarket.
translation.it: Non ci sono filmati del supermercato.

translation.en: All the cameras had been turned off.
translation.it: Le telecamere erano state tutte spente.

translation.en: I'm sorry. That must make your job a lot harder.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Questo complicherà le indagini.

translation.en: And also, sorry for all the swearing.
translation.it: Mi scusi anche per le parolacce.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Okay. I'll call you in a second. Sorry.
[Erin in English] Harper, let's go.
How did it go?
Apparently there was no supermarket footage.
translation.it: Non ci sono filmati del supermercato.

translation.en: Weird. Maybe there was a problem with that other camera after all.
translation.it: Che strano. Forse anche l'altra telecamera aveva problemi.

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
translation.it: Ma cosa ti dice la testa?

translation.en: Erin, stop, please.
I thought I was helping you.
And what if someone finds out, huh?
Do you know what that makes me look like? Like I've got something to hide.
translation.it: Sai cosa sembrerei? Una che deve nascondere qualcosa.

translation.en: [Emilio] I thought it'd be easier this way.
[Erin] Well, it isn't. Is it?
translation.it: Beh, non è così. O sbaglio?

translation.en: Emilio, I didn't ask for your help. I didn't ask you to steal camera footage.
translation.it: Emilio, non ti ho chiesto né aiuto né di rubare quel filmato.

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this.
[Harper] Mum, what is it?
Sorry, I'm okay. It's just…
Sometimes I wonder if we made a mistake in coming here.
translation.it: A volte mi chiedo se abbiamo sbagliato a venire qui.

translation.en: Harp, slow down.
-You left your glasses in the car. -[Harper] I don't care.
translation.it: - Hai dimenticato gli occhiali. - Non m'importa.

translation.en: The sun is bad for your eyes.
translation.it: Il sole ti fa male agli occhi.

translation.en: Good. I want to go blind. I'm bored of waiting.
translation.it: Bene! Voglio diventare cieca. Sono stufa di aspettare.

translation.en: Put your glasses on.
-Harp! -[Harper] You're hurting me!
I'm not hurting you. I'm trying to protect you.
Leave me alone!
I don't want to go. I like it here.
translation.it: Non voglio andarmene. Mi piace qui.

translation.en: Hey.
Do you remember when we first moved here?
And I couldn't keep you out of the water.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a farti uscire dal mare.

translation.en: You wanted to go to the beach every day. You'd wake us up at 6:00 a.m. with your costume on.
translation.it: Volevi venire in spiaggia ogni giorno. Ci svegliavi alle 6:00 col costume.

translation.en: And I had to stop because the sun hurts my eyes.
translation.it: Ma ho smesso perché il sole mi fa male agli occhi.

translation.en: Well, that's why you need to wear your special glasses.
translation.it: Beh, è per questo che devi portare gli occhiali.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on, Harp!
[Harper] Hey, Mum…
Harp, you can go inside the house. I'm just… I'm just going to have a quick chat with Penelope.
translation.it: Harp, vai a casa, io devo dire una cosa a Penelope.

translation.en: She hates me, doesn't she?
What? No.
Of course not. No, she doesn't.
translation.it: Certo che no. Non ti odia.

translation.en: I was just starting to enjoy school.
Please don't let her kick me out.
Please, Mum.
Listen, she's not going to, okay?
Don't worry.
Come here.
Now go inside.
I'll see you there.
Hey.
Have you dropped your complaint against Harper yet?
translation.it: Hai ritirato le accuse contro Harper?

translation.en: No. Of course not.
I'm going to ask you politely one last time.
translation.it: Te lo chiedo per l'ultima volta.

translation.en: Please.
No means no, Erin.
I filmed you
having sex with your tennis coach.
translation.it: Di te che scopi col maestro di tennis.

translation.en: Have you lost your mind?
Spying on people.
-Filming them. -You came after my family.
translation.it: - La riprendi? - Hai attaccato mia figlia.

translation.en: Your daughter broke my son's teeth. [Erin] I'm not saying this is my finest hour, okay?
translation.it: - Ha spaccato i denti ad Antonio. - Non ne vado fiera.

translation.en: But if you don't back down,
translation.it: Ma se non ritiri le accuse,

translation.en: I have no choice. I'll send the video to your husband.
translation.it: manderò il video a tuo marito.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You see, Erin,
he phoned the morning of my birthday,
translation.it: mi ha chiamata la mattina del mio compleanno.

translation.en: said he wasn't able to make it home.
Some important meeting.
When I told him I was upset, he said,
translation.it: Ci sono rimasta male, così lui mi ha detto

translation.en: he'd paid for the fucking party, what more did I want?
translation.it: che aveva già pagato la festa, cos'altro pretendevo?

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that, um…
And I'm not judging you. I'm just…
I'm protecting my daughter.
I see no reason why we can't sort this out between us. As neighbors.
translation.it: Direi che possiamo risolverla tra noi. Da brave vicine.

translation.en: Thank you, Penelope.
[Penelope] Don't thank me.
What you've done here, Erin, it was a mistake.
translation.it: Quello che hai fatto, Erin, è stato un errore.

translation.en: A big mistake.
[Jordi] Dinner is served. How hungry are you?
translation.it: La cena è servita. Quanta fame hai?

translation.en: [Harper] Kind of hungry.
[Jodi] Okay, I will give you a kind-of-hungry portion. Hey.
translation.it: - Ok, allora ti meriti una bella porzione. - Ciao.

translation.en: Here we go. We need to eat fast if we're going to make it to Harper's musical on time.
translation.it: Ecco. Dobbiamo mangiare in fretta, ci aspetta il musical di Harper.

translation.en: Harper is, uh… she's, um…
she's not in the musical.
What?
What happened?
They just had too many people or something.
It's one of those things.
I broke two of Antonio's teeth. Now Mrs. Reyna's trying to expel me.
translation.it: Ho rotto due denti ad Antonio e la sig.ra Reyna vuole farmi espellere.

translation.en: [Jordi] Wait. What? Seriously?
Okay, relax. Okay? Relax?
I'm sorry. I should've said something. Yeah.
Can we talk about this later? I really need to get changed.
translation.it: Possiamo parlarne dopo? Devo proprio cambiarmi.

translation.en: [Jordi] Harp, you can eat in front of the TV.
translation.it: Harp, puoi mangiare davanti alla TV.

translation.en: Um, so, you know, Penelope trying to get our daughter kicked out of school,
translation.it: Penelope vuole far espellere nostra figlia da scuola.

translation.en: it's kind of a big deal.
I've sorted it out.
How?
It doesn't matter.
[Jordi] All of it matters.
The supermarket, the police, everything.
You could have died the other night.
translation.it: L'altra sera hai rischiato di morire.

translation.en: But you're acting like it was normal.
translation.it: Ma ti comporti come se fosse normale.

translation.en: Look at me.
I'm wearing a tie.
I fucking hate ties.
translation.it: E sai che le odio, cazzo.

translation.en: I think it looks nice.
[Jordi] When did you start keeping things from me and shutting me out?
translation.it: Quando hai iniziato a nascondermi le cose? A escludermi?

translation.en: [Olivia] Enjoy the show. It's just through this way.
Enjoy the show.
-Right. -Welcome.
It's through this way.
Hi!
Enjoy the show.
-Nice to see you. -You too.
-Welcome. -Thank you.
Hello.
[Olivia] Enjoy the show.
Thank you very much.
So, what's tonight's excuse?
translation.it: Allora, qual è la scusa di stasera?

translation.en: Traffic? Flood?
I had a fight with Jordi.
I just…
I just don't know how you do it.
You have twice as many kids and responsibilities, but you're always on time, always on form.
translation.it: Hai il doppio di figli e responsabilità, ma sei sempre puntuale e in forma.

translation.en: I'm so high right now, this is basically an out-of-body experience.
translation.it: Sono così fatta ora che questa sembra un'esperienza extracorporea.

translation.en: -Whoa. -I know.
You'll be okay.
You're right where you're meant to be.
-Yeah. You're high. -[applause]
Yeah.
Fuck's sake, we're missing it. Come on. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky ♪
♪ The stars hanging over your head ♪
translation.it: Le stelle che splendono sulla tua testa

translation.en: ♪ The sun burning brightly in red ♪
translation.it: Il sole che di rosso brucia

translation.en: ♪ It all started with a bang ♪
translation.it: È iniziato tutto con il Big Bang

translation.en: ♪ It started with a bang ♪
translation.it: È iniziato con il Big Bang

translation.en: -♪ It started with a bang… ♪ -Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.it: È iniziato con il Big Bang Torno tra un minuto.

translation.en: [students] ♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky… ♪
Excuse me.
Can I help you?
If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.it: Se cerca il bagno, è vicino all'ingresso.

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
translation.it: Se ne vada prima che chiami la sicurezza.

translation.en: You know, I almost didn't believe it.
When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.it: Quando ti ho vista al supermercato, pensavo fosse

translation.en: "Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake."
translation.it: Quando ti ho vista al supermercato, pensavo fosse un gioco strano di luci, un errore.

translation.en: But no.
It really is you.
I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
Jesus Christ, what the--
-[woman] Look at me. -[Erin heaves]
Fucking look at me, Kate!
[chuckles] There she is!
You shouldn't have come here.
Yeah, I wasn't planning on staying, Kate.
-But I know you have it. -No, I don't.
translation.it: - Ma so che ce l'hai tu. - No.

translation.en: Look at what I've been reduced to.
I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.it: Rapino i supermercati, un gradino sopra al furto di borsette!

translation.en: And it's all because of what you did.
translation.it: Ed è tutta colpa di ciò che hai fatto.

translation.en: Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.it: Dammelo e basta. Me ne andrò, nessuno saprà che sei qui.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
But it's you, so I don't.
translation.it: Ma sei tu. Quindi non posso farlo.

translation.en: Okay.
I never liked you anyway.
translation.it: Mi sei sempre stata sul culo.

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
translation.it: Non farò del male alla bambina, ma dovrò portarla con me.

translation.en: Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Altrimenti non mi crederanno. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: -[bones crunch] -Stay away from her!
[Emilio] What the fuck?
Is she dead?
Jesus Christ.
Who is she?
She's the woman from the supermarket.
You warned me, didn't you?
Okay.
Okay.
Clean up what you can.
We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.it: Abbiamo 15 minuti per sistemare e portare via il corpo.

translation.en: ♪ We share the same solar system… ♪
-It's faster if you help. -Okay.
translation.it: - Se mi aiuti, facciamo prima. - Ok.

translation.en: ♪ We all share the same intergalactic ♪
translation.it: Condividiamo tutti Lo stesso spazio intergalattico

translation.en: [Emilio] Okay.
That should be deep enough.
Come.
-Do you want to say a few words? -What?
Fuck you for this.
Fuck you.
I meant a prayer or something.
But no, that's good.
I mean… That's good.
Why are you helping me?
'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
translation.it: Perché sei la moglie del mio migliore amico.

translation.en: We are practically family.
And also, I'm in trouble.
I've got mixed up with some bad people.
translation.it: Ho dei conti in sospeso con della brutta gente.

translation.en: So maybe I help you and then you help me.
translation.it: Se io ti aiuto, magari tu aiuti me.

translation.en: Emilio, I'm a schoolteacher.
Yes, of course you are.
Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.it: La sig.ra Carter, in classe con un cadavere.

translation.en: What if I don't want to help you?
[woman] I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
And when I get a bad feeling, I just…
translation.it: E quando ho un brutto presentimento,

translation.en: I walk away.
[Harper] I think it might be burnt.
[Jordi] Okay, let me see that.
[Harper] Sorry.
[Jordi] How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.it: Cucino io e tu lo giri?

translation.en: [Harper] Sounds good.
[Jordi] There… that one.
-That's it. -[Harper chuckles]
[Harper] Mum.
